Intel.text:
Population: 32,440 Primary Export: Snowcones
This sub-zero wasteland houses the enemy's early warning systems. Don't let us down, Atomic Tank!

Population: 23,815 Avg Temperature: -33 C
In winter months, the midnight sun of Frigistan never sets. Also, you should wear good thermal underwear.

Population: 643,030 Primary Export: Mail-order brides
The spectacular coast of Blastnya attracts both vacationers and enemy commanders. Take them out, Atomic Tank!

Population: 523,984 Unit of Currency: the Blastnik
Until the conflict, Blastnya was popular with backpackers due to the favorable exchange rate.

Population: 3,942,356 Primary Export: Petroleum, Oil, Gas
The rich oilfields of Petrovakia feed the thirsty war machine of the enemy. Don't let up now, Atomic Tank!

Population: 3,212,456 National Bird: Scarlet Cockerel
It is a little known fact that Petrovakia is home to over 3000 species of birds.

Population: 2,322,125 Primary Export: Plutonium Rods
The nuclear reactors of this region supply energy and weapons to countless foes of freedom.

Population: 2,122,165 Government: Technocracy
Nuke-Corp lackeys in parliament ensure that new reactors are constructed on a monthly basis.

Population: 1,212,496 Primary Export: Hambobolubia death-masks
The enemy's arsenal lies camouflaged within this steamy rainforest. Defoliate at will!

Population: 721,572 Average temperature: 39.5 C
The most common cause of death in Zamblamia is mosquito bites. The Zamblamian skeeter grows to lengths of 6 inches.

Population: 499,834 Primary Export: Scary movies
Not even darkest night can conceal the enemy from the brilliant, searing light of atomic justice!

Population: 417,549 Average annual vampire attacks: 6
The Spitting Bat, native to this region, disables its prey by spewing a paralyzing agent when within striking range, or when it's just plain angry.

Population: 32,105,843 Primary Export: Rubble
This war-torn nation has been invaded nearly 50 times in the last century. Don't get bogged down, Atomic Tank!

Population: 25,135,853 Primary Industry: Body Bags
Not surprisingly, the rate of alcoholism in this region is the highest in the world.

Population: 564,923 Primary Export: Tasteful rugs
This bleak desert country conceals subterranean command bunkers. Watch your temperature!

Population: 521,425 Yearly Rainfall: 4 cm
The black scorpion of this region is famous as the world's most poisonous arachnid. Be careful during bathroom breaks!

Population: 45,203,201 Primary Export: High-tech equipment
This vast metropolis is the heart of the enemy empire. Don't fail us now, Atomic Tank!

Population: 34,123,251 Founded 1350 AD
Though this appears to be Red Star's last stand, we have noticed an increase in radio chatter originating from somewhere outside the region...

Population: 3,821,387
Through your heroism, the brave efforts of the allied forces, and not a few rubber hoses, we have discovered the location of Red Star's secret headquarters! Let's finish this once and for all!
